details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.7 Unicode character maps - Unicode mapping
details.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 19005-2:2011, 6.2.11.7.2.

rule.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 19005-2, 6.2.11.7.2.
